master_of_arms.name: Master of Arms
master_of_arms.description: Increases the attack power of all alliance members' troops.

fortification_experts.name: Fortification Experts
fortification_experts.description: Increases the defensive power of all alliance members' troops.

logistics_specialists.name: Logistics Specialists
logistics_specialists.description: Increases the travel speed of all alliance members' troops.

expanded_charter.name: Expanded Charter
expanded_charter.description: Increases the maximum number of members in the alliance.

reinforced_vaults.name: Reinforced Vaults
reinforced_vaults.description: Increases the capacity of the alliance bank.

forestry_experts.name: Forestry Experts
forestry_experts.description: Increases wood production for all alliance members.

masonry_techniques.name: Masonry Techniques
masonry_techniques.description: Increases stone production for all alliance members.

coinage_reform.name: Coinage Reform
coinage_reform.description: Increases silver production for all alliance members.

training_regimens.name: Training Regimens
training_regimens.description: Reduces the training time of all units for alliance members.

naval_engineering.name: Naval Engineering
naval_engineering.description: Increases the attack and defense of all naval units.

diplomatic_leverage.name: Diplomatic Leverage
diplomatic_leverage.description: Increases the amount of resources gained from farming villages.

advanced_storage.name: Advanced Storage
advanced_storage.description: Increases the warehouse capacity for all alliance members.

generous_contributions.name: Generous Contributions
generous_contributions.description: Increases the daily donation limit to the alliance bank.

rapid_donations.name: Rapid Donations
rapid_donations.description: Reduces the cooldown time between donations to the alliance bank.

divine_devotion.name: Divine Devotion
divine_devotion.description: Increases favor production for all alliance members.
